Text: RE Hellopst All devastated here really sorry Best of luck keep in touch over next few days Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent November To Lonsdale Chris Subject RE Hello You will be popular Jonathan W seems very excited about the new position hes in I presume he assumes well all be working for him not necessarily bad news though Things are very much getting back to normal here we actually didnt work this weekend Where did the Chris come from did you drop the tine Original Message From Lonsdale Chris Sent Tuesday November AM To Kitchen Louise Subject RE Hello Dear Louise Sorry I havent got back before cant imagine why How I things with you here people seem to be going thru the various stages of mourning I think were between anger and resignation right now As the only exDynegy person here my popularity has shot up things were put in perspective when someone asked me if there were any goodlooking blokes in Dynegy Answers to your much earlier questions Jonathan Lesley were surprised and amused when I congratulated them some while ago on their marriage they clearly werent I dont think thats changed Jennifer got a decent package out of Powergen went to TXU where she spent a great time skiing in Geneva with the family and then got another good payoff She then went on to EdeF to advise them how to managerenegotiate their longterm contracts sound familiar I think she just wanted to consult but they offered her a full time job Got the distinct impression shes regretting accepting it as she has to commute work in an openplan office where ordering curtains beauty treatments etc is not very private business and deal with the French Havent seen her since the summer tho and havent seen Caroline for years Shes just waiting for the Hess sale to see whether shes wanted timetables slipped a bit and probably wont be completed until March or later I will have to get back in touch as I might need some old friends Jonathan W and Dave Redmond started at Dynegy Monday so inside info should be available Keep in touch and keep the faith Best Wishes Christine Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent September To Lonsdale Christine Subject RE Hello Did Jonathan and Lesley ever get married Marcus spoke to Caroline last week and said she wasnt very happy It would probably be great for Caroline to do something else I have no opportunity to get to London at all as I have no dealings with anyone in London any more I do speak to Marcello and Matthew Scrimshaw regularly and keep up on the gossip although there frankly doesnt seem to be much Whatever happened to Jennifer I was thinking about her the other day as I saw Mike Gibbons is still a Director of PowerGen Are you coming over here at all it would be great to see you over this side of the water David Hutchinson is coming over next month Louise Original Message From Lonsdale Christine Sent Monday September AM To Kitchen Louise Subject RE Hello Hi Louise Yes thought Id follow in your footsteps but a bit late in the day for me to catch up Dynegy was no longer the place to be Working for Mr Crilly which is interesting Andy co are a great bunch of guys on the trading desk Im staying off the phones too old for all that and am doing strategy will get them sorted out here in the end Saw Lesley and Jonathan at their house warming a couple of weeks ago they were looking good even Jonathan and the house was lovely Lesley would love to see you if youre ever over so would I Things might not be too good for Caroline Hess Marketing up for sale Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent September To Lonsdale Christine Subject Hello Just saw your name on a report for the first time Are you here now Hows it going so far
